description: Corrected with the original, as confirmed by Maimonides in an autograph. Poems in honour of Maimonides at the beginning by Joseph ben Simon, Ḥasdai Ḥalabi, Yitsḥaḳ ben Aldanan, Judah ben Solomon Harizi and an anonymous writer; one at the end by Ḥananʼel ben Karʼatha.
title: Mishneh Torah (Sefer ha-Madaʻ. Sefer Ahavah)
author: Maimonides, Moses
